Class DefaultAnnotationAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.worldwind.render.AnnotationAttributes
      • map.DefaultAnnotationAttributes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gov.nasa.worldwind.Restorable, java.io.Serializable

    public class DefaultAnnotationAttributes
extends gov.nasa.worldwind.render.AnnotationAttributes
implements java.io.Serializable
    Serializable AnnotationAttributes that also defines default values for the attributes. See the AnnotationAttributes documentation for descriptions of the static field values.
    Author:
    swong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
